// .env '/opt/google/chrome/google-chrome', // for GitHub Actions Ubuntu }, svgo: false, }) .use(remarkRehype, { allowDangerousHtml: true, footnoteLabel: 'è„šæ³¨' }) .use(rehypePrism) .use(rehypeKatex) .use(rehypeStringify, { allowDangerousHtml: true }) .process(markdown) ) .toString() .replace(/@@baseUrl@@/g, process.env.baseUrl || ''); ``` ä»¥ä¸‹ã«ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚’ç½®ã„ã¦ãŠãã¾ã™ã€‚å›³ãŒSVGã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‹ã‚‹ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ ## Flowchart ````markdown ```mermaid flowchart LR A[Hard] -->|Text| B(Round) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result 1] C -->|Two| E[Result 2] ``` ```` ```mermaid flowchart LR A[Hard] -->|Text| B(Round) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result 1] C -->|Two| E[Result 2] ``` ## Sequence diagram ````markdown ```mermaid sequenceDiagram Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
